#define luaD_checkstack ( L,
n   ) 
Value:
if ((char *)L->stack_last - (char *)L->top <= (n)*(int)sizeof(TValue)) \
    luaD_growstack(L, n); \
  else condhardstacktests(luaD_reallocstack(L, L->stacksize - EXTRA_STACK - 1));
